name: The Origami Room
description:
The origami room is a game using the new different AR way for you to learn origami. In this game, you have to print the origami paper before starting to play. After starting, you will explore the room and you will find the origami books which teach them difference origami. Just follow the guiding books to fold paper, then trying to “use” these items back to the game. 

This game I build with "Vuforia Augmented Reality" and it's just a prototype for now I am trying to combine the physical works into the game so that you can have different experience in game. I may update the game in the future if lots people like my game idea.  

 Welcome to give me your feedback and advice. Hopeful every could have fun.
